message.body: Gonna grab a beer with a friend at Nat mechanics but I'll def stop by
Cool! I actually have an Ebola thing happening at work but I'll be there in half an hour or so
Updating Ebola information (huge outbreak going on!), not that I personally got Ebola (that I know of?) (...yet??)
Heading over soon... How much longer will you be there?
Whoops, I had to run to get back for Lego/ponies/chicken. Sorry to miss you! Richard & photos & Simone in a bit are still there. Let's catch up soon, next week maybe?
Nah not my plan a either!
